title: Looking for t206 Young Glove with SC 350-460, 42 back
author: David R

posts.post_title: Looking for t206 Young Glove with SC 350-460, 42 back
posts.post_content:
Willing to buy or trade for a Young glove with SC 350-460, 42 back  

I have the following to trade:

AB 350 no frame Griffith batting SGC 40
Young pitching Piedmont 150 SGC 40
Mathewson White Cap Piedmont 150 SGC 30
Waddell portrait Piedmont 150 SGC 30
I saw a nice one on ebay listed a few days ago PSA 4 with a Factory 42 no overprint.

[quote name="jp1216" post=989461][url]http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&_trksid=p4340.l2557&hash=item19cf547d80&item=110852603264&nma=true&pt=US_Baseball&rt=nc&si=pOnZdC9Cg99POy4czvLvmj0BWu8%253D&orig_cvip=true&rt=nc[/url]

PSA 4 from eBay[/QUOTE]

Thanks guys.  I was trying to not pay too much of an inflated eBay BIN premium.  If only he had this one listed at the slightly inflated BINs of the other two SGC 50/PSA 4 Young Gloves on eBay.
